review_title: I learnt alot during my career with CRS
cons: I do not think any of cons

pros: good learning opportunities, good education policy for employee, gender equality, employees oriented policies. conducive and friendly environment environment. All members are like family members.
cons: At local level, mean at country level, sub-offices are headed by the local staff who prefer to appoint their kith and kins, and least preference is given to talented and experienced staff. international staff should be hired as head of office at each country level, particularly in Pakistan.
